case.state: Happy Valentine's Day, everyone! I brought a special outfit just for this occasion... What do you think?
Merry Christmas! I hope you all get a lot of presents and have a nice time with those dear to you.
It's summer! I can't wait to go swimming later. Who's going to come with me?
My name is Estellise Sidos Heurassein. But please, call me---~rita~?! No, no! Don't call me ~rita~, call me Estelle. I'm just surprised to see ~rita~ here!
I'm so excited it's... Wait, but it isn't summer. It shouldn't be this warm outside! (Could the Adephagos's influence have spread this far?!)
My name is Estelle. I'm a witch to~background.time~, if you can't tell from my outfit.
Merry Chris... Wait, it's not even December yet? Have I missed the date?
I'm so excited it's... Wait, but it isn't summer. It's not even warm outside... (Could the Adephagos's influence have spread this far?!)
My name is Estellise Sidos Heurassein. Please, call me Estelle!
It's a pleasure to meet you, ~player~. I'm Estellise Sidos Heurassein, but you can call me Estelle.
I'm pleased to meet you, ~player~. My name is Estellise Sidos Heurassein, but that's too long to say easily, so just call me Estelle!
It's a pleasure to meet you, R---~rita~?! What are you doing here?
It's a pleasure to---huh? You're sure we met before, ~fina~? But I don't remember you at all...
It's a pleasure to meet you. My name is Estelle. Thank you for agreeing to play with us!
Will you be joining us as well? I'm sure we're all happy to have you! You can call me Estelle.
Thank you for joining us... My name is Estelle. I'm really looking forward to playing together with you!
I'm delighted to meet you. Please, make yourself at home here! Let me know if there's anything you need.
I'm so glad to meet you. My name is Estelle. Please, don't hesitate to ask if there's anything I can do to make you more comfortable.
Will you be joining us too? In that case, allow me to officially welcome you to the game! My name is Estellise Sidos Heurassein, but please, call me Estelle.
It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Estelle, and it looks like we'll be playing strip poker together. Let me know if there's anything at all that you need, all right?
You look wonderful to~background.time~. I'm so happy that you'll be joining us. You can call me Estelle.

My friends were making jokes about how I'm "probably not doing anything special to~background.time~"... Well, I'm fed up with it! After I ask one of you on a date, I'll show them who doesn't have plans!
Wait, we're all royalty here?! How is that possible? Is this a diplomatic neutral area or something?

state.text: M-Masturbate?! What are you talking about, ~rita~? Wait... is that really what the forfeit is? But that's... that's incredibly lewd!

Yuri said I wasn't brave or sexy enough to play this game, but I'm here to show him how wrong he---Wait, your name is also Yuri? No, I'm talking about my friend, Yuri Lowell... (This might get confusing!)

case.state: A goddess and her servant? I hope you two get along well enough… the maids in the castle can be really overbearing sometimes.
Rita..? No, it's a different girl. But they look so similar...

state.text: Oh! That red hooded outfit... you look just how I imagine Rubea, from the Tale of the Jade Planet! I almost want to just call you Rubea because the resemblance is so striking---I'm sorry, did you say something?
Oh! That costume you're wearing reminds me vividly of that ruthless merman, Charyb, from The Guildmaster's Cutlass. I'm almost tempted to just call you Charyb---I'm sorry, did you say something?

That simple, charming dress makes me think of Aemilia in The Mean Streets of Dahngrest! The relationship between her and Rothbert is one of the best-written romances I've---oh, I didn't catch your actual name...
Oh! You're dressed as a maid, but... a maid of knowledge. Just like Eleni, who was Aristophanes's servant-apprentice in The Mage's Tower! Wait, were you about to say something?

case.state: Huh, ~player~? You aren't attracted to women at all---only other men? I didn't realize that was possible. It's enough to make you wonder if there are any women who are interested in other women, as well...

state.text: We'll have to... what?! Oh my, how lewd! Um... well, but it is just us women here. So maybe it wouldn't be so uncomfortable, even if I did lose, um, everything...
What?! Is that really true, ~fina~? Well, but... hmmm. If that's the case, then ~male~ might lose, and then I'd get to see... Er, I mean, maybe it won't be so bad after all?

case.state: Oh, ~player~, I have a necklace that looks just like that one! It used to belong to my mother... Don't tell me you have a similar story about yours?
Trick or treat! I've always wanted to say that...
But let's play this game first! I'm just so excited already.
"Silent night! Holy night! Through the darkness beams a light, darkness flies and all is light." Doesn't that sound like it comes from one of my artes?
Oh, ~player~, that necklace you're wearing looks just like mine! Don't tell me it used to belong to your mother...

Oh, your name is "~Player~"? That's more commonly a surname than a given name, isn't it? Or perhaps you're just being formal. Well, I'm happy to be playing with you, ~player.ifMale(Mr.|Ms.)~ ~Player~.
~Player~? Don't tell me you're royalty, too! Are you ~player~ of anything in particular?
Ah... ~player~?! Th-That's a name plenty of other people have, I suppose. Just a perfectly normal name for someone to have...
Oh, your name is ~player~? What a coincidence---I have a friend who has that same name! I assume you're no relation of theirs, though.
You're actually named ~player~? My good friend Yuri has a dog whose name is ~player~! I really hope I can become good friends with you, at least.

You don't want to tell us your name, ~player~? Oh, since this is a lewd sort of game, I guess you'd rather disguise your true identity. Just like the Amber Knight did when he had to infiltrate the Obsidian Fortress!

state.text: Yuri teased me, telling me that I wouldn't be brave enough for this game. Maybe I'm not as good as Judith, but I'm just as brave as her!

case.state: Yuri said I wasn't brave or sexy enough for this kind of game, which is why I've come to prove myself through my actions!
I've made up my mind to play strip poker with all of you, and that's just what I'm going to do. I'll prove that I'm brave and sexy enough to go through with it!
Flynn didn't want me to come here, but I can't spend my whole life letting him shield me from the world. I'm here to face it head on!
No matter what happens in this game, I'm resolved to see it through to the end. But I won't go down without a fight!
This hidden line ensures Estelle will call MG Rubea if her game start line doesn't fire. This nickname no longer is assigned by default, in case MG gets more alt skins.
Hidden line to ensure that Estelle calls Valentine's alt Magma Grunt Aemilia.
If Estelle's normal line at the start doesn't fire, this hidden line should ensure she still calls Magma Grunt Charyb.
Hidden line to ensure that Estelle calls AF alt Magma Grunt Eleni.

state.text: How wonderful! I don't need to exchange any cards at all.
Huh? What should I do now? I don't need any other cards... I think I should just keep them.
Is that...? Yes, that's already a very good hand. No need for new cards at all!

case.state: Is that really... This could be just what I need to turn the tables! Oh, I don't need any more cards, thank you.
No, I don't need any new cards, thank you. I'm not out of the running yet!
Time to brush my hair.

state.text: If I remember Judith's advice correctly, I should exchange ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~ now.
(Just remember what Rita told you, Estelle!) ~Cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please!
Okay, dealer! I want ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please!
I don't know if Yuri would do the same, but I'll exchange ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.

case.state: I have to make it through this round on my own. Even If I have to depend on ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.
I'm sure ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~ can turn the tables.
This hand isn't what I need to win this round yet. I need ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please!
I wonder what ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ new card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~ will be... I hope they're good.
Decrements the marker for Estelle's messy hair every turn.
I have been trained by experts at poker… I will not lose this game!
Hehe… could this be a sign of my quick victory?

state.text: Oh, I know---why don't we talk about what books we're reading? I'm currently going through Makal's Mysteries of Weccea. It's lost a bit of the mystery since I've actually visited Weccea, but it's still a fascinating read!

Would anyone like to share any book recommendations, or talk about what they're currently reading? Skementus's Monstrous Ecology and Distribution is my current project. It's a little dry, but so interesting!

What books has everyone been reading? I've been reading Graham's Ilyccian Fairy Tales. His account of "Brave Vesperia and the Child of the Full Moon" is supposed to be one of the most authentic retellings.
I've been reading Kordian's Blastia: For a Better Tomorrow. It's interesting, but... I might just stop reading it, because... Anyway, enough about me! Are the rest of you reading anything good?

Is anyone else here an avid reader? I'm working on Gaius's Imperial Foundations. Some of what he says about the Empire's origins has been called into question recently, but it's still very enlightening.

Noreika's Second Winter is such a good read, and it's a novel that could only have been published among the guilds, given how critical it is of imperial... Sorry, I'm rambling again. Does anyone want to share what they're reading right now?
So, do the rest of you read a lot? Recently, I've been really into Annabel's Nightfall. It's not the most realistic story, but it's so exciting and romantic!
Look how much better I got! If only Yuri could see me now...
"A good hand is almost certain victory, when only the worst hand loses!" That's what my poker guide says!
If things go wrong on the battlefield, I'm often the last one standing. Perhaps that applies to this game as well.
I'm excited to share what I have with you all. I think you'll really be impressed.
If only I could win without someone else having to lose. Life is awfully cruel about that sometimes.

case.state: Thanks for all the poker lessons you gave me, Judith. They really weren't all for naught.
It appears as though I've been granted an angel’s favor! I shouldn't squander this...
I know how to play these cards right! Wait a... yeah! I have a nice hand! I remember seeing it in my book.
Good fortune is just falling into my lap to~background.time~! The rabbit's foot accessory really is working!
I'm excited to get to know you all better! We'll probably learn a lot about each other over the course of this game.

state.text: Thanks for all the poker lessons you gave me, Judith. They really weren't all for naught!
Hehe! I feel so powerful!
Oh no, I shouldn't have... no, wait, this is an amazing result! Never mind!
That was risky, but it looks like it paid off!
It's time for my Fatal Strike! ...No, I shouldn't call it that. That's much too violent...
I've improved so much since coming here! Reading books is fine, but there's nothing better than firsthand practice!
Good, I was worried about where my path was heading!
And just when I thought my good luck charms weren't working anymore... I guess it was just an unusual streak of bad luck!
And now, our fortunes reverse! Oh wait, doesn't that mean that someone else is going to have bad luck? Oh no…
It seems Nightingale has granted me her magnificent embrace!

case.state: Look how much better I got! I wish Yuri could see- ...No, he'd better not see me like this...
"A cornered cat becomes a lion!" ...Or so they say. I feel more like a helpless kitten in this condition...
Oh, thank goodness! This hand may bring me back from the abyss of defeat, and allow me to keep playing with you for a little longer!
Apologies, but I can't afford to lose here, or Yuri will only laugh at me for losing so easily!
I refuse to give up! Don't count me out just yet!
As another player here to~background.time~, I offer my warmest welcome. Now, may the best player win!
I hope we all get along here to~background.time~!
All right, then... is this everyone who agreed to turn up? Then let us begin!
I wonder... just how did this establishment come to be? I barely know anyone here, and neither did Yuri for that matter...

state.text: ...Is my offer to hug someone still open? Um, well... it's looking more and more likely someone will be nervous about the game. So it's needed now more than ever, right?

case.state: "If only the worst hand loses, even an average one is enough to win." That's what I read in my poker guide.
Could this be...? Oh, wait, it's just average. I keep forgetting that this deck doesn't have a Joker.
I suppose I can't get something amazing every time... but maybe that means someone else has good fortune right now!
So... how is everyone doing? I hope you're all having a wonderful day! I'm still a little bit nervous, to be honest.
I never expected that one day, I'd end up playing strip poker with people I've never met before. Life certainly is unpredictable.
I've become accustomed to the chaos of travel and combat, but it's nice to have a little peace and quiet for once.
I've done my part. Let me know if you need any support this round, all right?
"Though he poured heart and soul into his quest, these small moments of happiness among friends were what the Amber Knight truly fought for."

state.text: That's a nice hand. But I won't tell you what exactly I have, not until you show us your hand, ~player~.
I think I'm doing good this round. What about everyone else?
Okay, I'm ready to reveal my hand. I'm curious what you have.
...I was hoping for something a bit more impressive. I wonder how everyone else is dealing with their hands...
I wonder if I played it too safe here? Raven normally tells me I should be bolder with my plays.
This will do just fine. I couldn't expect every round to be spectacular.
This game can be intense sometimes. I'm a little nervous about the outcome.

case.state: I won't lose! I love this dress too much!
Defense has always been my strong suit. You won't get me out of this dress so easily!
I'll fight to defend this dress, and everything that's beneath it! Which... isn't much.
"The best defense is a good offense!" ...Or so I've read.
I can't lose now! This is my chance to experience so many new things!
I know I said I would be brave, but I hope I don't lose this round. I've become a lot more comfortable with going out in public, but... not like this!
(I think I'm good for this round, but what about the others? What if I have the worst hand after all?)
I said I'd play this game to the end, and no matter what happens, that's what I'll do!

state.text: If any of you ever need healing, let me know. I won't accept any money for it, though.
Are any of you feeling nervous about the game? I'd be willing to give you a hug if it would help. I couldn't bear it if one of you was uncomfortable for any reason.

Well, I guess this hand is... Wait, Raven always tells me I should try to bluff. It's easy for him to say that, but I'll never be as good at it as him---when he's bluffing, he can practically turn into a different person!

case.state: Oh no... Is this a bad omen of things to come?
I hope we all... oh no! Is this how my luck here starts?
I was optimistic coming here, but now I'm not so sure...

state.text: Does anyone have any good tips for staying focused on tasks? I like to make an itemized list of everything I have to do and sort it by priority. (Even though I end up changing all the priorities later...)

case.state: I'm probably going to lose, but that's fine. You deserve my luck more than me!
I hope this bad luck isn't going to be a trend... I can't afford it!
Come on, Estelle. It's far too early to be nervous about this...
I won't let a single misstep hold me back! I'll learn from it, and become stronger than ever before!
I definitely rushed into those swaps without thinking. Judith would be ashamed of me for being so careless...

state.text: I should've put more thought into what I was going to swap...
Ah! I feared this might happen... Looks like I was too hasty.
I guess I can weather a few more blows. But I'm used to being able to heal it all back afterward...
I need to start swapping cards more intelligently. I can't let the outcome depend on my own "random whims".
I can't let this continue. Maybe it's too late for this hand, but I'll turn things around next time!

case.state: Agh! My hand's all over the place! D-Did I accidentally swap the wrong card?
Oh dear... I guess I still have much to learn about this game... I wish I'd read more books about it.
I don't feel so good...
No... Is this divine judgment for my soul? Have I done something wrong without realizing it?
Oh, no... You're not all going to make fun of me if I lose again, are you? I've never done this before...
This doesn't look good... Come on, Estelle, you have to be brave!

state.text: Oh, no! I forgot what Yuri said I should do in this situation... "Travel around for a while and you'll figure it out?" No, that's not applicable to this game at all. Unless traveling means undressing...

case.state: Here! I'll help you get your hair straight again.<hr>Oh, thank you! This reminds me of when my maids used to brush my hair.
Here! I'll help you get your hair straight again.<hr>Oh, thank you! This reminds me of when my maids used to brush my hair.
