"Water that evaporates from the ocean collects in the sky in the form of clouds. These clouds soon fall as rain, fresh water carrying plentiful dissolved aer---both of which are essential for the survival of life on land."
Balance between humans and the natural world... Yes, that's just what we're fighting for as well. With the might of not only the ocean, but the spirits of all four elements!
It's all too true... Humans can do terrible things to the environment, even with the best of intentions. We've been struggling with that fact for some time ourselves.
Did you really not know about the stripping part? I thought it was common knowledge...
Just like me... kept locked up with nothing but books to keep her company.
I wonder how boring that prison of yours was... given how isolated it is, I think you must have run out of reading material eventually.
Hmm? Is it just me, or does the emblem on that choker keep changing?
Is that sword important to you? You're handling it with great care.
It's so perfectly curved. I'd love to put my hands on it...
You have so many beautiful artifacts… I guess you wouldn't be much of a deity if you didn't put a lot of effort into your appearance.

Huh? How do you know that?
You're not going to take off your bra? But the only other thing you have is your... Oh, I forgot about your hair pins!
So you learned how to use magic at a school for witches? It must be lovely to attend an all-girls school...
Did your staff break, or something? I hope you already mastered its skill, if it had one...
I really like your ~clothing~. I have a cute white one, it matches my dress's color very nicely! Maybe I should bring it next time!
Did I mention that you have a very fashionable ~clothing~? At least, I think it's fashionable.

case.state: You're a magic user as well, right, Megu? Just like my friend! I bet you two have a lot more in common than that!

I'll bet you'd want someone kind, learned, and sensitive, who'd listen to you and give you the gentleness you secretly crave. Someone who could admire your intelligence and respect your conviction...

~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ of yours look~clothing.ifPlural(|s)~ like ~clothing.ifPlural(interesting little trinkets|an interesting little trinket)~. Do you mind if I register ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ in the collector's book?

case.state: I hope ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ the last accessor~clothing.ifPlural(ies|y)~ you have.

state.text: ~Nami~!! Don't worry, ~nami~, I can probably heal this... I think.

case.state: Does your Yuri also have long dark hair and cool attire? Could it be that we're talking about the same person, after all?

state.text: I believe my friend Raven would say you and Rita are both rather eccentric, Megu.

Amazing! Without the hat you look even more like Rita!

state.text: But such a reckless change to the balance of life will only cause natural disasters like that to worsen further! Even ruthless Charyb wouldn't perpetuate such violence against his own home!

But that would put all life on the planet in danger! Even the savage mermen of the sea play an important role in the marine ecosystem. Hasn't taking on Charyb's visage inspired you to consider his side of things?

~Magma_grunt~, there will only be more and deadlier natural disasters if we upset the delicate balance of life by making such extreme changes! I don't think you're quite as wise as the Rubea from my book...

You want to endanger all life on the planet just for that? What about all the majestic creatures that inhabit the ocean? The Rubea from my book would never want to turn the entire world into the Ruby Wastes!

But that would endanger the entire world, and disrupt the beautiful marine ecosystem! Aemilia loved her city deeply, despite its flaws. Can't you manage that same respect for the planet you call home?

But thoughtless changes like that will only cause even more such disasters! Aemilia would never have tried to solve Dahngrest's societal problems by burning it to the ground---and you shouldn't either!
Then... you just hit people with them? That doesn't seem like a very effective combat style. I suppose almost anything can serve as a decent weapon if it conducts aer well enough for its user, but...
Oh, is that what your costume is? The mages I'm used to seeing don't wear anything like that, so that's not what confused me. It's a really cute outfit, though---I think it suits you!

R-Really? You... want to marry a woman? I've never heard of such a thing! Well, I suppose some of the villains in the books I've read were described a little like that, but I assumed that only happened in stories.
Hmmm... I still really am a naïve girl, aren't I? It just never occurred to me that someone like you would be interested in such a lewd and scandalous pastime for its own sake.

Then you do dislike the ocean? You can't just snatch the world away from the creatures of the deep, like Aristophanes kept his barrier from the townsfolk to protect his tower! You're not like Eleni at all!
Your clothes are really lovely though. They remind me of my Enchanting Belle outfit. If they don't help you make friends, I'm sure they'll at least bring you plenty of attention.

Your clothes are really lovely though. They're actually a little like what I'm wearing to~background.time~. If they don't help you make friends, I'm sure they'll at least bring you plenty of attention.
What?! You weren't? But... that can't be! ~Fina~, why didn't your parents give you anything to read? Were they too poor? You don't look poor...
Then it's settled! Maybe we can meet here later, since I'm not sure how to get to where you're from... Oh, if you like, I could even show you the book I'm writing myself!
...Bless me with the courage to fight back. Oh, perhaps I should address this prayer to Sylph? She does control the wind now in Terca Lumireis. I don't know if she's exactly a goddess, though...

case.state: I'm pleased you think so, ~kora~. I certainly have many more friends now that I'm traveling outside the castle. Things are more difficult sometimes, but all in all, I think my situation is quite good nowadays.

state.text: How exciting... I suppose I should be grateful you're on our side, or you might strike any of us down before we ever know it... You are on our side, right, ~shamir~?

Well, I hope you do have that opportunity someday, because it's been wonderful for me. I still miss the castle sometimes, but it's worth it to have visited so many beautiful and fascinating places all over the world.

I just couldn't do that, ~rita~. I need to be able to concentrate on one thing at a time, and in some large complex full of monsters or enemy soldiers, I'd lose my mind if things like that were distracting me.

I didn't realize you were that nervous. I certainly can't blame you---I'm still wrapping my head around the impropriety of this situation, myself. But don't worry! I'm here too, and I'm certainly no stranger.
Er... give land back? But no one's literally taken anything from the ocean, right? They've just polluted it in some way. Shouldn't the response just be to remove the pollution?
Well, but will having more ocean really help those sea creatures? Wouldn't it be better to clean up what's already in the ocean, rather than add new regions that are likely polluted as well?
But playing a game like this is a perfect way to overcome your anxiety. We should invite more men next time!
I'm so glad you came back! I used to travel with someone who also ran away whenever he got scared. I hope you get over your anxiety eventually.
Huh? I-I was talking about the sword. I wasn't thinking of anything inappropriate...!
Wait, it's just your hairband? You got me all worked up for nothing!
Just the ~clothing~? I can't believe you tricked me like that!

case.state: How dare you get my hopes up like that?! ...Oh, never mind. It's just a game after all. I don't know why I'm so bothered by this…
Oh, now we have both have messy hair. You still look fine, though!

state.text: I'd love to meet your sister as well someday. I bet she looks like a younger version of you and... She spoils you?
Oh, something like your step-mother... (So she wasn't raised by her real mother as well? I'm curious, but I'm afraid to ask.)
You have sisters?! I've always dreamed of having siblings. Being an only child is so boring sometimes. I bet you always have so much fun together!
Do you want to talk about why you were kept like that? Do you have some special power, like me?
I'd have gone insane in the castle if it wasn't for my sword fighting lessons, and the castle library getting fresh books...
Sometimes it's a bird, sometimes it's a cage... I wonder why.
Oh. I probably shouldn't tell Yuri about this, he'll just keep trying to figure out a way to use it. He's so stubborn sometimes…

case.state: A sacred blade that only the chosen may wield… it's one of my favorite fantasy elements! I wonder if there's a sword out there that only I can wield?

state.text: Only you can wield it? I won't get cursed when I touch it, will I?
Maybe that was just a small item, but you look so gorgeous with your hair down!
I have a precious necklace as well. It doesn't do anything like preventing petrification though… it's just sentimentally valuable.
"Efreet and Undine"? Those are the same names as two of my spirits as well!
So you think it wasn't a coincidence, but that it was fate that brought us together? Wow, that's just like a plot from one of my books!
Loose hair suits you so well! You're an absolute beauty, Weiss! But I guess that hair style isn't really suited for combat, is it?
And that wand is what you use to cast spells, right? In Terca Lumireis, we use blastia to use magic.

case.state: Don't worry! Your hair still looks all right. My hair gets messy so much easier.

state.text: Wait just a moment... you're a princess as well? Do we actually have another thing in common?
Oh! How... beautiful! Huh? Where did your ~clothing~ go?
Ah! The ~clothing~ turned into butterflies as well?
You took off two items? But your hat was so cute...
I'm always surprised by how many magical and mystical things there are in our world. Nice to meet you, Yuelia! I'm Estelle!
Ah, I was getting distracted by that. (I didn't even listen to what she said. Is that why she doesn't have any friends? Because her name draws all the attention?)

Well, don't worry, ~rita~. I'm pretty nervous myself, but remember that we're here together. We'll get through this challenge just as we have every other.

~Magma_grunt~, what you're doing is only going to cause even more disasters, as the delicate balance of life is disrupted. This isn't an acceptable solution!
No, ~magma_grunt~! The creatures that inhabit the ocean are beautiful and majestic, and all life on the planet depends on them! You can't destroy their habitat just because you're afraid of them!

You have to show me everything you can do with it later, okay?
(What was that power just now? It sent chills down my spine...)
(Something isn't right here... she's clearly no ordinary girl.)
You're just like me! Sometimes I forget I have certain accessories until I need to take them off to bathe.

case.state: Ah! You look so much prettier with your hair down!

case.state: I think that's something I like about this game. Even if it's a little nerve-wracking at first, the camaraderie we're building by undressing together is truly something special!

state.text: Well, but there are different kinds of trust... I feel I can trust Raven to protect me in combat, but in such a lewd situation... Oh no! What if he finds out about this place and follows me here?!

I still think I should have been more respectful of your boundaries, but you might have a point. In that case, let's discuss this more after the game. I want to make sure we know where we stand with each other.
It's okay, Florina! You can turn around when you're embarrassed. It lets us see more of your cute butt, too~
Oh my... that is indeed a surprise. But forgetting to put underwear on is still kinda cute!

case.state: My! What a cute shape! Do you trim it like that, or does it grow like that naturally?

state.text: Wonderful! I'm rooting for you and your nonstandard viewpoints concerning public nudity!
D-did it just graze your... And... did you just cum?
That's no good! If you don't tell him, he might never know your true feelings! You should definitely let him know how you really feel!
Did I really just say panties? I was going to say... Wait, you actually did take off your panties?

Wow, how did you do that? Can I do it too, if I put my hands together like that? Is it hard to learn?
The last, but definitely not the least, view. So beautiful! I-I mean the butterflies, of course!

case.state: It does look pretty like that, but I think it should be up to you to decide what to do down there, ~noelle~. After all, you'd only show that to someone who really loved you... Um, except in this game, I suppose.

state.text: After everything we've been through, we owe that to each other, don't we, ~rita~? To always stand side by side, to grow old and frail together... And to care for each other, as best friends should.

case.state: I must admit, I didn't think stripping naked in front of each other could feel like a bonding activity, but I feel like I've gotten to know everyone here much better since the game started!
We're all so exposed now... It's like we're all sharing a secret with each other!
We all have such varied body types... Humans really are a unique bunch, aren't they?

state.text: Wow, that is really a lot of hair. I can hardly avert my eyes from it...
Judith says that a full growth of hair is a symbol of a mature woman. I don't know what she meant by that, though...
So much hair...Doesn't it get uncomfortable, sometimes?
I guess it's up to you to decide what to do with it. But if there's that much of it, doesn't it increase the chance you might pull it by accident?
Wow, my maids at the castle used to shave me clean like that too, when I was still living there. But it's nice to let it grow, too.
So smooth! Do you shave yourself, or do you have someone else to do that for you?
Sure, shaving has its advantages, but I tried to shave myself once, and... hair down there isn't that bad, you know?
If you put in that much effort, you must really be dedicated to looking beautiful all over, ~name~. Wait... does that mean you expect others to see you naked?

case.state: Oh, how cute! Is it as fluffy as it looks?
That reminds me of doing it when I was clean-shaved... That was really something else.

state.text: Sorry, but… I can't help but smile at how cute it looks! ...Is cute even the right word to describe it?
So this is what you've been hiding from us? It looks almost... fascinating. (Wait, what?)
It takes a lot of courage to expose yourself, ~name~, and I admire that!
Wow... your vulva is beautiful, ~name~! Er... I'm sorry. That's probably not the best way to put it.

case.state: Could it be you're wetter than I am, even though I'm already...?
I haven't seen a lot of other naked women before, but I can tell you look gorgeous!

state.text: Huh? But... that's just what you did, ~nami_szs~. We all signed up for this game, right?

What do you look for in a man, ~nagisa~? I'd like to marry someone strong and brave, who seeks just solutions even in a mire of darkness and chaos---like the Amber Knight, from Tale of the Jade Planet.

So, tell me about what you look for in a man, ~nagisa~! Even if it doesn't work out between you and that boy in the end, I'm sure the world is full of many wonderful people who would be delighted to marry you.
So, what's the forfeit ~name~ will be expected to perform? Then... hmmm. That's interesting.
So, how exactly is ~name~ supposed to, um... follow ~otherjoke~'s lead in this case? Huh? ~target.ifMale(He's|She's)~ not expected to do the same thing?
Then, ~name~ isn't expected to do the same forfeit as ~otherjoke~? I'm not sure how I feel about this inconsistency... but I suppose it makes sense for ~name~'s unique situation.
Oh, no... Am I not giving you enough time to speak, ~natsuki~? I'm so sorry! I'd be happy to be quiet if---wait, or are you not talking about me?
That sounds incredible, ~natsuki~! I'd love to read a story about something like that. Preserving art and poetry from ancient civilizations certainly sounds heroic to me.
Oh, is that so, ~nagisa~? We'd better be careful, then---I wouldn't want you to miss your curfew! If we're taking too much time, it should be fine if you just leave early.

I'm sure it's fine, ~nagisa~. It's certainly what I'd expect, and I don't think anyone in particular is in charge of the game, so I don't know who you'd ask. If anyone objects, I'll take full responsibility.

Think nothing of it, ~nagisa~. I haven't ever done anything like this, either---but if we're determined enough, and don't let these lewd circumstances affect us, I'm certain we'll be able to get through it!

I'd never accuse you of impropriety for following the rules, ~nagisa~. Though it certainly is a strange idea, isn't it? Normally, laws exist to prevent such indecent behavior... This game turns everything on its head!

I didn't think you were, ~nagisa~, but I'm glad to hear it. I suppose some commoners might be so afraid to win against a noble like me that they'd throw the game, but I'd much rather you gave it your all!
~Nagisa~, I realize this is probably overwhelming for you, but I'm here to support you however I can. If you feel uncomfortable, or if you need anything at any time, please let me know!
So, ~nagisa~, tell me about the school you go to! I've only had private tutors before, but it must be so much easier to make friends at a proper school! Do you have lots of friends?
~Nagisa~, you must read plenty of books at your school, mustn't you? Tell me, which books do they have you reading? Are there any you're particularly fond of, or favorite subjects to read about?
So, ~nagisa~... I know you don't have many friends right now at your school, but... what about special friends? Is there anyone you like right now? If you tell me, I promise I'll keep it a secret!
Isn't this exciting, ~nagisa~? I'm really looking forward to seeing your breasts, since I can already tell they'll be lovely. Oh, but perhaps I shouldn't say things like that.
Ah! What is she doing?!
So you're actually a princess of a place called Ylisse? I admit, I'm unfamiliar with Ylisse. Perhaps after this game, you could teach me about your country!
Is it okay if I ask you about vampires? I would like to learn more about them, if you're not too busy with the game.
Is it okay to ask you some questions, ~name~? I'm curious about what activities your club does!
You're part of a literature club right? That's so exciting!
I must admit, I didn't expect to meet another heir to a throne here. What reason do you have for being here?
You're a vampire? I've read so many books about vampires! I love the stories where a human and vampire fall in love with each other...
So, you're a pirate? Have I mentioned that I traveled with a pirate on my journeys? Her name was Patty. We searched for the legendary Maris Stella.
It's so exciting that you can fly, ~name~! Don't you love the feeling of soaring through the sky without a care in the world?
Well, ~name~ lost, but ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ doesn't really look worried...
I could try to encourage ~name~, but I'm not sure if ~target.ifMale(he|she)~ needs much encouragement to undress.
You seem to really like this game, ~name~. I guess you enjoy being seen?
As strange interests go, wanting to lose at strip poker seems much more reasonable than wanting to get injured by powerful opponents in a fight. It's too bad Zagi wasn't more like ~name~.
~Name~ looks pretty happy about this. I don't really understand, but I'm glad losing suits you!
If it's ~name~ who lost, I guess I shouldn't feel bad. ~target.ifMale(He|She)~ doesn't really seem to be interested in winning in the first place.
When ~name~ loses, it almost feels like we're both winning!
I'm glad it was ~name~ this time. It seems silly to feel bad about ~target.ifMale(him|her)~ losing.
Oh? You brought your weapons, ~name~... Is that something people usually do at these games?
Are you going to be all right, ~name~? Well... you certainly don't look worried.
You're just taking all of this in stride, aren't you, ~name~? I suppose Judith would do the same... especially in a game where undressing is the penalty.
I'm happy to support you however I can, ~name~... Not that I get the impression you need much support thus far, but I thought I'd offer anyway.
You're not worried about this at all, are you, ~name~? You must be quite accustomed to situations like this.
You probably don't need my encouragement, right, ~name~? Let me know if I'm getting annoying, and I'll try to tone it down.
Do you often play games like this, ~name~? It seems you're not particularly afraid of losing, anyway.
Oh, I suppose ~name~ shouldn't mind losing all that much. That definitely makes me less anxious about the consequences of my own victory.
~Name~ doesn't look very concerned. I'm relieved that my victory hasn't proved too much of a hardship for ~target.ifMale(him|her)~.
I can't feel too bad about winning. I'm certain ~name~ will be able to handle the consequences... Won't you, ~name~?
An exquisite victory! And I doubt ~name~ will be bothered much by losing, so that makes it even more exquisite than it would be otherwise.
Don't underestimate me, ~name~. I can tell stripping doesn't bother you much, so I have no reason to hold anything back!

case.state: I'm excited to see you undress, ~name~! I suppose that's a little inappropriate, but it doesn't seem as though you mind much, right?
It's really impressive that you don't object to undressing, ~name~. Don't worry---I don't object to you undressing, either!

state.text: I'm sorry for winning this round, but---Oh, but it's silly of me to say that to ~name~. I'm sure ~target.ifMale(he'll|she'll)~ be fine either way.
I read once that repeated failures can affect one's judgment. Don't lose your head, and stay calm!
Well, that's a bad stroke of luck. Still, I'm confident that it's just a bad stroke of luck. Consecutive losses are statistically unlikely to occur!
Two in a row? Were you looking at your cards properly? I don't know how anyone could be that unlucky...
Well… think of this bad luck as a sign of some upcoming good luck for you! You did bad these last few rounds, so now you'll have all your bad luck used up!
You lost again? I hope you're able to come back from this, because it's not fun when you lose all the time.
I guess this outcome wasn't wildly improbable, but I still can't help but feel sorry for you. I hope your luck turns around next time!

case.state: I didn't lose the first round. What a relief! That gives me some confidence at least.

"The Full House can only be beaten by a Four-of-a-kind and a Straight Flush". Don't blame yourself for losing, ~name~!

Why do I have the feeling that I was actually supposed to strip this round?

case.state: What? ~Name~ has the worst hand? Did you do that to prevent me from losing this round? Thank you so much!

state.text: Yes, I didn't lose! Who wants a high-five?

case.state: "If you know your opponent and know your own hand, you can make it to victory."

My apologies, ~name~, but you'll need to do better than that. Should I lend you my poker guide?
Sorry if I hurt your pride... it's just a game, right? No hard feelings?
Sorry, but I can't afford to lose anymore. I hope you understand, ~name~.
Oh, dear! I forgot for one moment that every victory of mine is connected to a loss of yours... Sorry, ~name~!
This game has really gotten intense. But I'm not about to quit when I've come this far!
I won't have to lose any more of my dignity for the moment... If only it hadn't had to be at ~name~'s expense.
Try to relax, ~name~! My... indecency... must be throwing you off, so try to imagine something else!

Oh, that's interesting. Just wait a little until...
Who would have thought? This book is really amazing!
Could it be...? Uh-huh, that makes sense...
Oh! Can you wait for a little while? I think I got to a really amazing part.

state.text: Victory calls, and I come! ...Huh? Did I say something amusing?

state.text: Yes, and fairy tales shape the way we think about the world. Even if they aren't literally true, they can have a very real impact on our daily lives.
A payphone? Those work like blastia that allow you to communicate over long distances, right? I've read about them, but I've never seen one before. Could I come with you to see the payphone?
But if I tell you it's acceptable to remove your socks and I'm wrong, the whole thing is my fault for giving you incorrect information. So I think it makes more sense that I'd receive the punishment.
Were you kept indoors a lot growing up? Because I was, and I understand exactly what you mean. I'm not completely accustomed to the idea of others thinking about me like that, either.
Well, I certainly don't think so. Yuri didn't seem concerned about this place's legality when he described it to me. But then again, he's never that worried about---oh my, I hope this is legal!

That sounds wonderful. I'm glad so many women seem to frequent this place---I was afraid it'd be mostly men, which would have been pretty intimidating. It's much more comfortable with girls my age around.

That sounds wonderful! And what happens next? I hope the fisherman and the turtle princess get married and live happily ever after! Ah, but I suppose you may not have finished it yet...

Well, who knows? You might be underestimating your own charms, and there's no sense in giving up before the battle's fought. You're at least planning to get to know him better, right? There's no harm in that!
I wonder what's behind the mask? Usually it's someone the protagonist knows intimately, or a dashing, handsome rogue or---
And there goes your sword, your belts and uh... quite a lot of things. You seem like the over-prepared type...
Oh, I didn't expect you to be wearing another layer under your bodysuit. Or is that actually your underwear?
I can't fly myself, but Rita can levitate, and sometimes she lets me come along by hanging onto her legs. Those are the moments I treasure... because I just love flying so much!
But if you're a vampire, how come you're not burning or sparkling in the sunlight? Do you wear sunblock?
Do you have sleepovers? Gossip? Braid each others hair? Cook meals? Or do you just read in peace and share your experiences?

Many books say that vampires don't like the smell of garlic. It's said that it can even scare them away!
You seem like you know your way around a blade. After we're done here, can you teach me a few things? I'm still not confident in my own swordplay…
So you play... video games? I'm not familiar with those, but I'm interested to know more!
That green hair is an unusual sight. I think Droite is the only other person I know who has that kind of hair color.
That's a school uniform you're wearing, isn't it? It was always my dream to go to school and wear something like that.
That looks so cute! It's part of your uniform, right?
It didn't seem appropriate at all for me to bring my sword or shield into a friendly game. Is there... some reason we might want to have weapons here?
Out of curiosity… do gods need to eat? Sleep? Do they go on dates? Sorry for asking so many questions, I'm just really curious how different you are compared to mortals like us!

What?! I guess ~clothing.withart~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ usually very useful as raw material for anything else, but it still seems so wasteful to just destroy ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~!

But why... why would you destroy your ~clothing~, ~name~?
You can take your ~clothing~ off with magic? How exciting!
It's so exciting to watch ~name~'s ~clothing~ disappear!
I guess it's more fun to take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off this way.
Your clothes don't disappear completely when you do this, right? I assume you'll need them later.
These sorts of tricks are delightful. Thank you for making the game more interesting, ~name~!
Is that a spell you're using, or a special skill of some kind? I wonder what equipment type would even let you learn such a skill... Underwear, maybe?
It's too bad we can't win battles by vanishing clothing instead of causing real harm with attack spells. Although, I guess that would be really embarrassing...
I wonder if I could learn a spell to take off my dress. It's pretty difficult to do it quickly.
I didn't expect someone else to be stripping this way. It's like we're putting on our own magic show!

~clothing.ifPlural(Are|Is)~ your ~clothing~ uncomfortable? You seem so eager to get ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off.

(I wish I was that confident about my body... ~Name~ might even be a little too confident.)
If ~name~ wants us to watch ~target.ifMale(him|her)~, I guess it would be impolite not to.
Please let me know if there's anything I can assist you with, ~name~. Don't worry---I wouldn't charge you anything for it.
Do you mind having someone else undress you like that, ~name~? The maids in the castle used to do that for me, but I wasn't always comfortable with it.
I suppose it is easier to remove one's ~clothing~ with some assistance.
Be careful not to touch ~name~ anywhere inappropriate while you're removing ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~. It's important for us to be respectful to one another.
How kind of you to assist ~name~ with ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ ~clothing~. It's such a pleasure to watch people working together like this.
It's important to respect someone's personal space as much as possible while undressing them. Please bear that in mind as it pertains to ~name~.
Isn't it beautiful to watch people come together like this? Even in strip poker, that civic spirit holds strong.
There's something inspiring about collaborating to remove one another's garments, even though we hardly know each other. First ~player~ and I, and now ~name~ as well...
Now that I think of it, some of my own clothes are quite difficult to remove without assistance. I wonder if anyone here would be willing to help me with them...
That hairband reminds me of Rita's when she put on that incredibly cute school uniform!
It's wonderful to be such close friends with someone, isn't it, ~name~? Rita and I are that way as well---she often helps me undress when we're short on time.

Ooh, that actually sounds wonderful! Instead of worrying about lines of succession and producing heirs and everything, we could just have fun together. It'd be like a sleepover every night!

state.text: Oh... Come on, ~natsuki~, can't you be a little nicer to ~rita~ than that? ...Actually, can't both of you be a little nicer to each other? I just want all of us to be friends...

"Blastia use the primeval power of aer that fills the world to provide us with fire, water, and light. They provide us with everything that has made the empire prosper." ...And thank you, but I don't live nearby.

How wonderful! I'm so excited to visit one of your world's bustling metropolises, with majestic payphones dotting the streets as far as the eye can see... And that's all right, I don't live around here.

Well, what sorts of things did you do in class with her? Do you have any of your old artwork to remember her by? Mementos like that really help me when I'm missing someone.

Wh-What?! No, of course not! I'd never suggest something so indecent... I only meant you should have tea with him, or go for a walk in the park together, or something like that!
Wait, you were actually a girl all along?! It's like that one story where the ninja reveals herself as a lost princess, The Legend of… uh… what was the name?

But unfortunately I only got private lessons in the castle...
I wish I could've attended school... all I got were stuffy instructors and no real classmates.
I hope you're not one of the evil vampires I read about in older books... I read that they prefer to bite young women my age...
I don't like the smell of garlic myself, but I was told that a princess mustn't be picky about her food...

Do you expect we could get attacked? Well, I suppose I still have my magic and my healing artes, even if I can't do much in melee in this condition. But why would someone attack a peaceful strip poker game?
Then you got rid of ~clothing.ifPlural(it|them)~? But if you aren't worried about keeping ~clothing.ifPlural(it|them)~ with you, why did you come here armed in the first place?

I guess ~name~ had fun with that.
I hope you do well in the next hand... or maybe I should hope you do badly? That seems to be what you'd prefer.
I didn't realize anyone could enjoy stripping so much. Well... I guess I could imagine Judith feeling that way. Maybe you'd get along with her, ~name~.
I'm not sure what to say in this situation. I didn't expect anyone to want to lose.

I'm out? B-But I wanted to fly with Florina so badly... And I've never done this outside of my bedroom before! I don't know if can do it while sitting on the ~background.surface~...

Yes, this chair looks perfect! It's a good thing we decided to play here to~background.time~... Don't worry, everyone, I promise to give it my all!
~Rita~, I can't believe this! You're wonderful! How did you even have time to... I shouldn't have doubted you, ~rita~. If you're with me, I know everything will be fine.
Oh, this chair will work wonderfully! Thank you so much for... huh? Did you have an alternative suggestion, ~noelle~?
Oh, I nearly forgot that I'm a witch to~background.time~. I can sit on my broom!
Oh, my, I can't believe someone brought this lovely chair just for me... Was that you, ~player~? It's such a thoughtful gift, I don't know what to say...

(...Actually, what would Yuri have stripped if he were here? Oooh... That might be helpful to think about in more detail.)
Seems like it works this way... T-This actually feels pretty nice...
This seems so inappropriate... I don't even know how many dates you're supposed to go on before doing this for someone. It's not too much for you, is it, ~player~?
I'm really happy we all get to use chairs... It would have been so unfair for me to be the only one here who got one.
Ah... I never thought... I'm really getting into it...

Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes!

state.text: That actually felt wonderful... ~Sakura~, ~player~, everyone, it's been such a pleasure playing with you all!
So, ~player~... You are going to go on a date with me, right? After all that... it seems like it ought to be your responsibility, doesn't it?

case.state: It was a pleasure... I-I mean, it was a pleasure to play this game with you!
I hope I looked sexy. What do you think, ~player~...?
I didn't think I'd enjoy that as much as I did! I should do this more often...
How was that... Did I do a good job paying you back for the chair you brought me?
Mmm... that felt just like doing it back in my bedroom. Maybe even better... Did I do a good job?
Hey, Lotte! This is a book with all kinds of information about this place. Do you want to read it with me while the game's still going?
You guys still need a while, don't you? Do you mind if I read in here while you finish this game? This is a book with all kinds of information about this place.
I don't think there's a rule that says you have to strip in a certain order, but... isn't it more embarrassing to show your crotch first?

I... I'm sorry, ~kyou~. It's not that I'm not interested... It's more that a book like this might not exist anywhere else, so I couldn't possibly pass up the chance to at least flip through it. I'd be happy to look for facts that might interest you, if it would help you feel better about it.

This is so interesting, ~rita~. Apparently if someone names themselves "Hermes" or "Miska", you'll treat them like an expert and stop lecturing at them about blastia and aer... but then if they change the name to "Karol", you won't think they're an expert anymore. Is that really true?
Oh, listen to this, ~rita~. Apparently if someone who you consider an expert on blastia changes their name to Karol, you'll no longer consider them to be an expert. Is that really how you'd react?

~Wikipetan~, I couldn't fault you for being interested in this book. I'll be happy to lend it to you after the game's over. Well... after I'm done reading it, at least. Wow, do you really have different facts to recite for us depending on what day of the year it is? I didn't know that.
Did you know that in 2019 the Halloween and Christmas event were put together into a "Nightmare before Christmas" event?
"The SPNatI version of Tharja's Christmas outfit was originally made to appear only in Catria's epilogue, but was made into a real outfit for Tharja later."

"April Fool's characters appear at the Inventory around April Fool's Day. They are strange, usually humorous characters that are allowed to break the normal rules and expectations of a strip poker game." I see. That explains so much about what's been happening to~background.time~...

"A few characters on the main roster actually originated as April Fool's Day characters, and vice versa. Wikipe-tan and Magma Grunt both debuted as April Fool's characters before being reworked into serious ones."

"Sponsorship consists of members of the community evaluating a character and outlining what's necessary for that character to be accepted to the main roster. It does not involve any sort of payment." Well, that's a relief! Otherwise, if you were poor, you might be stuck in testing forever...
Did you know that the Inventory has had more than two hundred characters, and that half of them have over a thousand lines? I don't know what it means by "lines", though...
"If a character is completely reworked, the old version stays at the "offline Inventory" as a Classic version." ...That explains a lot.

Seems like there is a debug mode in the offline version. You just have to enable it in the config.xml and press Q during the game. Now I just need to find out what a debug mode and an offline version is...
Did you know this? "The Inventory opened on June 30th, 2015. The first visitors were Lara Croft, Zoey, Lilith and Elizabeth".
"If there is something about the game or a character that you like, feel free to give feedback by pressing the green button after the game." I wonder if people liked me...?
"Most of the characters at the Inventory are women, but there are men as well. The first male character was Shaggy."
"The player was once restricted to taking off clothing in a logical order." Now I just need to figure out what they consider logical.
"The order the characters appear in the selection screen is determined by a so-called "Re-sort poll" that is held every six months." I didn't know that.
Wow! It says here that there is a trading card game with all characters that have ever been at the Inventory called "TCNatI". Does that mean there are cards of me as well?
"Every newcomer at the Inventory has to go to the testing tables for some time. After an induction ritual called sponsorship, they can become regulars at the Inventory."
Lotte, what does the tag "bi-curious" mean...? This book says that we both have it... <hr> W-what! Oh... uhh... I-I can show- Err, t-tell you after the game if you'd like...
Look at this, Lotte! It's a list of all the people who have ever come to the Inventory! <hr> Oh that's neat. Huh, I was 138th? Interesting... Wait! How was I here before Akko!?
Do you know what the "tentacle forfeit" tag is for? Does the loser has to eat seafood, or something? <hr> Er... I'll tell you later, okay?
"TCNatI cards include stripped, naked, and masturbating versions of most characters." How lewd! Now I really need to find out if there are cards of me or not...

"The Inventory is staffed entirely by volunteers. If you want to meet more patrons or add more new features, the best way to make it happen is to join our staff yourself and offer your support." Wow, they must be really passionate about keeping this place running...
I usually fall asleep right after I finish. No wonder I got so tired all of a sudden.
This chair is really comfortable. Even if I would have preferred to have done it on a bed...
Are you tired as well, ~player~? I could sleep right now... I hope you don't plan on doing anything naughty.
I see... Who'd have thought that... Mnnn...
Did you know that... Oh! That's interesting as well!
Oh, that's good to know... But I shouldn't read this out loud. It could make ~player~ nervous.
You'll take care of me if I drift off all of a sudden, won't you, ~player~? I can trust you to do that, right?

scene.name: Sleeping beauty
scene.directive: After the game and long after you went to bed, you wake up in the middle of the night.
You're lying in your bed in the middle of the dark. It's a little chilly.
But not only that: Something, or someone is lying next to you and has appearently stollen all your blankets.
Silently, not wanting to startle whoever the blanket thief might be, you're looking for the switch of your bed light.
The thief turned out to be a sleeping princess.
Of course you remember Estelle.
Looks like she didn't go home like the others did and somehow ended up in your bed.
...Mnnnn.
Oh, it seems like your light has waken up the sleeping beauty after all.
~Player~... Nice to see you again.
How did you end up in my bed?
Huh? This isn't my bedroom! Is that your bed, ~player~? How...?
Oh, no! I remember. After the game I was so tired, I went to the first bed I could find.
didn't even noticed that you were already sleeping in it.
What a terrible mistake! I'm so sorry!
I will leave at once, but... Ah, I left my clothes at the inventory...
Unless...
You would allow me to stay here for tonight.
Would that be alright?
You don't mind? Thanks a lot, ~player~!
You're really like a knight, helping a damsel in distress.
This situation really reminds me of those story from one of my favorite books.
I always dreamt to meet such a knight like fro that story.
He was offering the heroine a place to sleep without wanting something in return after she lost her place to stay.
I hope you don't plan to take advantage of this situation, do you?
Flynn told me about knights who forget all their honor when it's about an beautiful girl.
That would be a little bit exciting, though...
I always loved the more romantic scenes. Only two persons, destined to meet each other...
The book always gets vague on what exactly happens, but leaving everything to the reader's imagination is even more exciting.
Say, ~player~, doesn't this setting excites you as well?
My heart is beating like crazy.
You're so gentle, ~player~.
Say...
Have you ever slept with a woman before?
